title: Drawing, "A Young Woman, probably St. Mary Magdalene under the Cross", 1550–75
medium: Red chalk on thin brown paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Shown in three-quarter profile from the back, a woman with flowing robes and head and hand raised.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Young Woman, probably St. Mary Magdalene under the Cross", 1550–75.
1550–75. Red chalk on thin brown paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7340.
